mapper.sql: a.id, a.area_id AS "area.id", a.name, a.enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, o.name AS "area.name", o.code, a.useable AS useable, a.is_sys AS sysData
mapper.select: SELECT , rm.menu_id AS "menuList.id", ro.area_id AS "areaList.id" FROM sys_role a JOIN sys_area o ON o.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_area ro ON ro.role_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM sys_role a JOIN sys_area o ON o.id = a.area_id WHERE a.name = #{name} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

SELECT
FROM sys_role a JOIN sys_area o ON o.id = a.area_id WHERE a.enname = #{enname} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

SELECT
FROM sys_role a LEFT JOIN sys_area o ON o.id = a.area_id WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY o.code, a.name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( id, area_id, name, enname, role_type, data_scope, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, is_sys, useable ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{area.id}, #{name}, #{enname}, #{roleType}, #{dataScope}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysData}, #{useable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET area_id = #{area.id}, name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, role_type = #{roleType}, data_scope = #{dataScope}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, is_sys = #{sysData}, useable = #{useable} WHERE id = #{id}
